statements: SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE room_name = 'Living Room';
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE owner_id = 123;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT DISTINCT room_name FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE active = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, device_type, room_name FROM smart_home_devices WHERE owner_id = 456;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE room_name = 'Bedroom';
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Thermostat';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT device_type) FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_name LIKE '%Light%';
SELECT device_name, owner_id FROM smart_home_devices WHERE room_name = 'Kitchen';
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Security Camera';
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE active = FALSE;
SELECT AVG(owner_id) FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT MAX(owner_id) FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT MIN(owner_id) FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type, room_name FROM smart_home_devices WHERE active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_name = 'Smart Plug';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM device_logs;
SELECT log_timestamp, log_message FROM device_logs WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT username, device_name, log_message FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id JOIN device_logs ON devices.device_id = device_logs.device_id;
SELECT username, device_name, log_message FROM users LEFT JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id LEFT JOIN device_logs ON devices.device_id = device_logs.device_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(device_id) AS num_devices FROM devices GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT device_name, COUNT(log_id) AS num_logs FROM device_logs GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM users;
SELECT device_name, MIN(log_timestamp) AS earliest_log FROM device_logs GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT username, COUNT(device_name) AS num_devices FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id GROUP BY username;

SELECT username, device_name, COUNT(log_id) AS num_logs FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id JOIN device_logs ON devices.device_id = device_logs.device_id GROUP BY username, device_name;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT device_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, created_at)) AS avg_age_days FROM devices GROUP BY device_name;

SELECT username, device_name, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, log_timestamp, NOW()) AS time_since_last_log FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id JOIN device_logs ON devices.device_id = device_logs.device_id;
SELECT username, MAX(log_timestamp) AS last_log FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id JOIN device_logs ON devices.device_id = device_logs.device_id GROUP BY username;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_users FROM users;
SELECT device_name, SUM(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, log_timestamp, NOW())) AS total_log_duration_minutes FROM device_logs GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT * FROM houses WHERE id = 1
SELECT name, location FROM houses WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM houses WHERE name = 'House A'
SELECT * FROM houses WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT id, name FROM houses
SELECT * FROM houses ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM houses ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM houses
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM houses
SELECT name FROM houses WHERE location = 'California'
SELECT AVG(id) FROM houses
SELECT * FROM houses WHERE name LIKE 'House%'
SELECT * FROM houses LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM houses OFFSET 10
SELECT * FROM houses WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10
SELECT * FROM houses WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6)
SELECT * FROM houses WHERE id NOT IN (3, 7)
SELECT * FROM houses WHERE name IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM houses WHERE location IS NULL
SELECT * FROM houses WHERE id = (SELECT MAX(id) FROM houses)
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM rooms;
SELECT room_id, room_name FROM rooms;
SELECT * FROM device_logs;
SELECT log_id, device_id, log_timestamp FROM device_logs;
SELECT log_id, device_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM device_logs WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM schedules;
SELECT schedule_id, schedule_name FROM schedules;
SELECT schedule_id, schedule_name, device_id, start_time, end_time FROM schedules WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT users.user_id, users.username, devices.device_name FROM users INNER JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id;
SELECT device_logs.log_id, device_logs.device_id, devices.device_name, device_logs.log_timestamp FROM device_logs INNER JOIN devices ON device_logs.device_id = devices.device_id;

SELECT device_logs.log_id, device_logs.device_id, devices.device_name, device_logs.log_timestamp, device_logs.log_message FROM device_logs INNER JOIN devices ON device_logs.device_id = devices.device_id WHERE device_logs.device_id = 1;
SELECT schedules.schedule_id, schedules.schedule_name, devices.device_name, schedules.start_time, schedules.end_time FROM schedules INNER JOIN devices ON schedules.device_id = devices.device_id;
SELECT devices.device_name, rooms.room_name FROM devices, rooms;
SELECT devices.device_name, rooms.room_name FROM devices INNER JOIN rooms ON devices.device_id = rooms.room_id;
SELECT users.username, devices.device_name, rooms.room_name FROM devices INNER JOIN rooms ON devices.device_id = rooms.room_id INNER JOIN users ON devices.user_id = users.user_id;
